name: La vive Muerte
description:
A birthday, Party, Piñatas and the zombie apocalypse? Shoot for your life in this Chaotic top down shooter.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Aim: Mouse

Shoot: Left mouse Button

Dodge: Shift

Firerate Upgrade:

Charge Upgrade:

Shotgun Upgrade:


Bounce Upgrade:

This game was made by Christian Fedrau, Dominik Akbary Huelva and Frederic Hoffmann for the brackey's game jam 6, with the theme, Let there be Chaos.
